### Overview
The aim of this project is to build up a predictiom model for the quality of five excercise manners from six people. The data source is http://groupware.les.inf.puc-rio.br/har. R programming lauguage was applied for the statistical process. The report output is HTML style converted from RMD document via knitr package.
